title: I've Had Bigger: And Other Things My Wife Said
description: Did you ever want to prank your wife everyday, write about the results, and publish them online without her knowledge? That’s exactly what Jeff Rice did in 2011. Now, the popular blog series will be available as a book for the first time ever, revised and updated with an all-new conclusion from the author. Don’t miss how this prank ends.
author: Jeff Rice
